segments.text: Good morning , and welcome to Live Tech . It is my honor to make this presentation for you . Let me begin by explaining some of our digital cameras ' selling points . You will see immediately that they are very stylish , but what you can't see is the cutting-edge technology inside . All of our cameras are light , compact , and easy to use .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I take a look at one of those ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Be my guest . Live Tech's digital cameras combine point-and-shoot simplicity with the ability to easily turn pictures into great-looking prints . Furthermore , it allows users to transfer pictures to a computer while the camera recharges .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I take a picture of you ? Seeing is believing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , Just push the button , like ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I can figure this out . Let's see if this works as advertised . Say ' cheese ! '
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you will find these are the best digital cameras on the market today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think the quality of the photos will speak for themselves .
segments.speaker: S2
